(Program
{ (If
    (Identifier)
    (ExpressionStatements
      (ExpressionStatements
        (FunctionCall
          (Identifier)
          (Identifier)))))
->(If
    (MemberAccess
      (Identifier)
      (Identifier))
    (ExpressionStatements
      (ExpressionStatements
        (FunctionCall
          (Identifier)
          (Identifier)))
      (ExpressionStatements
        (Identifier)))) })
